channel.title: shuubi83 – Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: Now now. Recon players receive too much hate in my opinion. We’re mostly the same after all.
item.dc:creator: shuubi83
item.description: Now now. Recon players receive too much hate in my opinion. We’re mostly the same after all.
item.content:encoded: Now now. Recon players receive too much hate in my opinion. We’re mostly the same after all.
